    • openTableClosureWindow

      void openTableClosureWindow()
      Opens the table close window and initializes the buttons for each table.

    • setTableStatusToAvailable

      void setTableStatusToAvailable​(int index, javafx.scene.control.Label statusLabel)
      Sets the table status to available and updates the corresponding label.
      Parameters:
      index - index of the table to be released
      statusLabel - label to display the table status

    • applyButtonStyleBasedOnStatus

      void applyButtonStyleBasedOnStatus​(javafx.scene.control.Button button, MainWindow.TableStatus status)
      Applies a button style based on the table status.
      Parameters:
      button - the button to apply the style to
      status - the table status

    • cancelTableTimer

      void cancelTableTimer​(int index)
      Stops the timer for the specified table and resets its time.
      Parameters:
      index - index of the table for which to stop the timer

    • showClosureSummary

      void showClosureSummary​(int index)
      Displays a closing summary for the specified table, including information about its usage time and price.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the table for which to display the summary

    • accumulateTableUsageTime

      void accumulateTableUsageTime​(int index)
      Calculates the total usage time of the specified table.
      Parameters:
      index - index of the table whose usage time is to be accumulated

    • refreshTableButtonStatus

      void refreshTableButtonStatus​(javafx.scene.control.Button tableButton, javafx.scene.control.Label statusLabel, javafx.scene.control.Label timeOfReserve, javafx.scene.control.Label priceForTable, int index)
      Updates the table button status and corresponding labels using animation.
      Parameters:
      tableButton - table button
      statusLabel - table status label
      timeOfReserve - reservation timestamp
      priceForTable - price label for the table
      index - table index
